text: George Clooney. Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images George Clooney was the world's highest - paid actor in the past year, according to Forbes. Clooney took home an industry - leading pretax paycheck of $ 239 million in the calendar year between June 1, 2017 and June 1, 2018, Forbes reported. Though he didn't appear in a film during that period, Clooney brought in his career - high salary on the strength of the $ 700 million sale of his tequila brand, Casamigos Tequila, in June 2017.
